https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sky8ZFQ9tDof0hXyrAwY6TNN4rZ.jpg An ordinary night starts to get dramatic for Ketan, a Maharashtrian migrant, when his car is being crashed and attracts excessive attention in the conservative neighborhood. Stuck with his mistress in his small rented room while his pregnant wife is away, he has to face the angry locals. A Cold Summer Night
